title: Runa — Book-Based Encryption
content: Encryption app using published books as one-time pads or codebooks. Includes arbitrary code-word and matrix encryption models. Parses and indexes PDF source texts with pagination normalization (Roman numerals, indices). Designed for offline use.

title: Runa — PDF Parsing and Indexing
content: Runa parses PDFs to extract page, line, and word references, normalizing pagination formats. Indexing enables fast and consistent encryption/decryption. Explores low-tech cryptography models.

title: Overhead Flight Controller — Raspberry Pi Airspace Display
content: Raspberry Pi dashboard for real-time air traffic using OpenSky Network. Displays aircraft metadata (origin, type, altitude) on InkyWHAT e-ink display. Designed for headless deployment. GPS integration in progress.

title: Overhead Flight Controller — OpenSky Integration
content: Uses OpenSky Network API to fetch and correlate flight data. Aircraft metadata is rendered on a custom always-on dashboard using e-ink. Built for Raspberry Pi with external API enrichment.

title: Home Server — Hardened Ubuntu on Repurposed iMac
content: Converted 2011 iMac into an Ubuntu Server. Hosts static and dynamic web apps via Docker. Includes automated backups, DNS failover, SSH hardening, and Tailscale VPN for private remote access.

title: Home Server — DevOps Stack
content: Dockerized deployment of services with Nginx reverse proxy and HTTPS via Let’s Encrypt. Tailscale for remote access. Local/cloud backup routines and firewall automation included.

title: Komodo — Harm Reduction App (Team Project)
content: Countdown timer and alert system for high-risk users. Sends emergency Twilio SMS alerts based on geolocation and unresponsiveness. Built with Redis, collaborative map-based frontend, and backend timers.

title: Komodo — Twilio + Geolocation Integration
content: Emergency alert system using Twilio SMS, Redis timers, and GPS-based check-ins. Map-based UI tracks user location. Developed as a collaborative project for harm reduction.

title: DoGoodr — Volunteer Matching App (Team Project)
content: Platform that connects volunteers with nonprofit events. Filterable event listings by tag, date, and organization. Backend built with RESTful API and database designed for search and user interaction.

title: DoGoodr — API and Search Backend
content: Designed REST API powering event search and discovery. Handles tag filtering, organization queries, and user interaction tracking. Delivered as a team capstone project.
